Style/NumericPredicate.description:
Description

Checks for the use of predicate- or comparison methods for numeric comparisons.
Style/NumericPredicate.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: predicate (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['predicate', 'comparison'] (type: list)
AllowedMethods: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
